page.title: 03SUNDAY FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Our group are doing a day in the life of{a normal Sunday for a family.}We will base it on family life. We think that the family should have some children who go to school and a father who works. The family will have to live in the 12 square kilometres that the school is covering. We think that they will probably have a{roast meal {for dinner.}We interviewed the family's mother and she said that she gets up at half past eight in the morning and has toast for breakfast. They don't go to church. They have a roast meal for lunch. In the afternoon the family does{gardening}or goes out. They watch mainly{nature programmes}on {television}in the evening. They have their evening meal at about six o'clock.They go to bed at ten o'clock. "This is just a normal Sunday", she said.
